LocationNotFound.zh: 無法取得您的位置，請重新傳送位置資訊。
LocationNotFound.en: Unable to get your location. Please send it again.

PlanLoadFailed.zh: 行程資料讀取失敗，請稍後再試。
PlanLoadFailed.en: Failed to load itinerary data. Please try again later.

PlanRecommendFailed.zh: 行程推薦失敗，請稍後再試。
PlanRecommendFailed.en: Failed to itinerary recommendation. Please try again later.

PlanProcessFailed.zh: 行程資料處理失敗，請稍後再試。
PlanProcessFailed.en: Failed to Process itinerary data. Please try again later.

NearbySearchFailed.zh: 附近搜尋失敗，請稍後再試。
NearbySearchFailed.en: Failed to Nearby Search. Please try again later.

LocationSaveFailed.zh: 位置資料儲存錯誤，請稍後再試
LocationSaveFailed.en: Failed to save location data. Please try again later.

NoCrowdData.zh: 目前無法取得當前時段的人潮資料。
NoCrowdData.en: Crowd data is currently unavailable for this time period.

DataFetchFailed.zh: 資料取得失敗，請稍後再試。
DataFetchFailed.en: Failed to retrieve data. Please try again later.
